channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Memory loss: As AI gobbles up chips, prices for devices may rise
item.description: Demand for memory chips currently exceeds supply and there's very little chance of that changing any time soon. More chips for AI means less available...

item.title: Russia sends 3 Iranian satellites into orbit, report says
item.description: The report said that a Russian rocket sent the satellites on Sunday from a launchpad in eastern Russia.

item.title: Viral global TikToks: A twist on soccer, Tanzania's Charlie Chaplin, hope in Gaza
item.description: TikToks are everywhere (well, except countries like Australia and India, where they've been banned.) We talk to the creators of some of the year's mos...

item.title: Brigitte Bardot, sex goddess of cinema, has died
item.description: Legendary screen siren and animal rights activist Brigitte Bardot has died at age 91. The alluring former model starred in numerous movies, often play...

item.title: 'Bomb cyclone' forecasted to bring heavy snow, blizzard conditions and dangerous travel
item.description: A 'bomb cyclone' is intensifying severe winter weather for millions of people across the U.S. The system is expected to knock out power and disrupt ho...

item.title: MayimFlow wants to stop data center leaks before they happen
item.description: Leaks cause damage, down time, and cost money. MayimFlow's founder John Khazraee wants to change that.

item.title: A guide to choosing the right Apple Watch
item.description: The gap between Apple's standard and budget smart watches has never felt smaller.

item.title: New York subway ends its MetroCard era and switches fully to tap-and-go fares
A winter storm threatens to bring blizzards and ice to parts of the U.S., hampering holiday travel
The Google Pixel Watch 4 made me like smartwatches again
item.description: Google's Pixel Watch 4 is an excellent smartwatch with fast charging and great design.

item.title: Midair helicopter crash in New Jersey leaves 1 dead and another critically injured
item.description: Officials say two helicopters have crashed midair in southern New Jersey on Sunday, killing one person and leaving another critically injured.

item.title: Why WeTransfer’s co-founder is building another file transfer service
item.description: WeTransfer co-founder Nalden has a new file transfer service that users can use without logging in.

item.title: The 33 top health and wellness startups from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the health and wellness Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition.

item.title: The 4 Best Types of Rental Properties for NEW Investors to Buy

item.title: Zillow Forecast: Best and Worst Housing Markets of 2026
item.description: The housing market correction is well underway, but the story looks very different depending on where you invest. Some markets are cooling gently, oth...

item.description: Starter homes have become nonstarter homes for many Americans. Three-quarters of the homes currently listed for sale are out of reach for median-incom...

item.title: The Most Encouraging Sign in 3 Years | Dec. 2025 Housing Market Update
